QAPair.Question: What is (are) Heart failure - discharge ?
QAPair.Answer: Heart failure is a condition in which the heart is no longer able to pump oxygen-rich blood to the rest of the body efficiently. When symptoms become severe, a hospital stay may be necessary. This article discusses what you need to do to take care of yourself when you leave the hospital.

QAPair.Question: What is the outlook for Heart failure - discharge ?

Question.qtype: when to contact a medical professional

QAPair.Question: Do I need to see a doctor for Heart failure - discharge ?
